vb17:1.17: anavaññātamado → anavaññattimado (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1); anavattaññimado (si); anavasaññātamado (mr)
vb17:1.43: cetaso ca līnattaṁ → cetaso līnattaṁ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
vb17:23.2: unnati unnāmo → uṇṇati uṇṇāmo (sya-all, mr); uṇṇati uṇṇamo (pts-vp-pli1)
vb17:41.2: paccayapaṭisevanasaṅkhātena → paccayapaṭisedhanasaṅkhātena (bj) | aṭhapanā → aṭṭhapanā (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1); āṭhapanā (si, mr)
vb17:74.2: makkhāyanā makkhāyitattaṁ → makkhiyanā makkhiyitattaṁ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
vb17:109.2: sotaṁ → suttaṁ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | visaṭā → visadā (si, mr) | āyūhanī → āyūhinī (mr) | santhavo → sandhavo (mr) | sineho → sneho (bj) | āsīsanā āsīsitattaṁ → āsiṁsanā āsiṁsitattaṁ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
vb17:167.1: katame tayo kiñcanā → katamāni tīṇi kiñcanāni (?)
vb17:193.2: anaddā anaddāyanā anaddāyitattaṁ → anādā anādāyanā anādāyitattaṁ (sya-all)
vb17:231.2: kumbhīlabhayaṁ → ūmibhayaṁ kumbhilabhayaṁ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1); kumbhīḷabhayaṁ (?) (kumbha + īra + a + bhaya)
